Name: Frulam Mondath
Traits: Spellcasting. Frulam is a 5th-level spellcaster that uses Wisdom as her spellcasting ability (spell save DC 14, +6 to hit with spell attacks). Frulam has the following spells prepared from the cleric spell list:Cantrips (at will): light, sacred flame, thaumaturgy1st level (4 slots): command, cure wounds, healing word, sanctuary2nd level (3 slots): calm emotions, hold person, spiritual weapon3rd level (2 slots): mass healing word, spirit guardians
Actions: Multiattack. Frulam attacks twice with her halberd. Halberd. Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d10 + 2) bludgeoning damage.
